summary: Core gameplay UI appears largely implemented in frontend/src/App.tsx (levels array, team setup state, movement logic, winner state, reset, mini-game dialog state) and a cosmic theme/background is applied in frontend/src/index.css. However, the diff also adds Internet Identity/auth-related hooks and wires an InternetIdentityProvider into the app entrypoint, which conflicts with the no-auth/no-backend constraints. Additionally, the required generated image assets themselves are not present in the diff under frontend/public/assets/generated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add generated static image assets (starfield background and Macro â†’ Micro badge) stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced by the UI.
missing_requirements.reason: The UI references the images, but the diff does not include the actual image files under frontend/public/assets/generated, so the acceptance criteria about generated assets being stored there is not met by the shown changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity / authentication context and actor creation logic added (login/identity management and authenticated/anonymous actor selection).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly forbids implementing any login/authentication and requires frontend-only gameplay with no backend dependency; adding these hooks/providers introduces an auth system and backend actor plumbing that was not requested.
BuildRequest requires no required backend functionality for gameplay; adding a backend actor (even empty) is not requested and, together with actor hooks, suggests unnecessary backend scaffolding.
